channel.title: How Do I Make myself Admin?
channel.description: Its a noobs question but yeah how...Im using Gangscapev5 Source and not sure how to make myself an Admin so if any1 can assist please do.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2007, 04:30:01 PM[/size][hr]anyone...sorry for breaking a rule :O

item.title: How Do I Make myself Admin?
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Even if he did break a rule, it’s not as serious as to issue a ban, or even a warning.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Make myself Admin?
item.dc:creator: @pk_for_me pk for me
item.description:
@pk_for_me wrote:

[quote=“ChemicalReaction, post:2, topic:125589”]Your not breaking the rules…

Go to charecters file…
open up your charecter file
where it sais
player rights = 0

change it to 3

0 = normal player
1= mod
2 = admin
3= owner[/quote]
yes he is breaking the rules. maybe if you say he’s not, you may break the rules the same as him.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make myself Admin?

item.title: How Do I Make myself Admin?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

That’s not a very good way actually.

Open Client.Java, search admin/mod list, scroll down, change the name in parenthesis to yours and change the rights to 1/2/3/4 (explained above).

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make myself Admin?

item.title: How Do I Make myself Admin?
item.dc:creator: @revol_2 revol 2
item.description:
@revol_2 wrote:

Omg,Chemical u forgot something,

0=normal
1=mod
2=Admin
3=Owner
4=Hide owner (your owner without but people dont see the admin things)

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Make myself Admin?
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

Your not breaking the rules…

Go to charecters file…
open up your charecter file
where it sais
player rights = 0

change it to 3

0 = normal player
1= mod
2 = admin
3= owner

Read full topic
